name: OpenCart
longDescription:
OpenCart is an online store management system. It is PHP-based, using a MySQL database and HTML components. Support is provided for different languages and currencies.

The default username: user and the default password is: bitnami. You can change these in the admin panel of the application. If you get an http mixed content error, change the HTTP_SERVER on config.php file to https
description: A free shopping cart system. OpenCart is an open source PHP-based online e-commerce solution.
